017package org.spongepowered.configurate;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
020import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
021
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024public interface CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N extends CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N>> extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N> {
025    /**
026     * Gets the current value for the comment.
027     *
028     * <p>If the comment contains multiple lines, the lines will be split by \n</p>
029     *
030     * @return The configuration's current comment
031     */
032    @NonNull
033    Optional<String> getComment();
034
035    /**
036     * Sets the comment for this configuration node.
037     *
038     * @param comment The comment to set. Line breaks should be represented as LFs (\n)
039     * @return this
040     */
041    @NonNull
042    N setComment(@Nullable String comment);
043
044    /**
045     * Set a comment on this node if it does not presently have a comment.
046     *
047     * The provided comment must not be null, because setting a null comment would be a no-op
048     *
049     * @param comment The comment to set. Line breaks should be represented as LFs (\n)
050     * @return this
051     */
052    @NonNull
053    N setCommentIfAbsent(String comment);
054}
